issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: In multi-cluster configuration, migrations using --source broken for all clusters but first registered.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{{euca-migrate-instances --source xx.xx.xx.xx}} works for the CC which resides on the same host with the CLC/Walrus, but fails for NCs which are in a different AZ.

*Issue:*
{noformat}
[root@b-27 eucalyptus]# euca-migrate-instances --source 10.111.5.33
Error(MigrateInstancesType): Failed to find ENABLED cluster for node 10.111.5.33
{noformat}

*euca-describe-clusters*
{noformat}
[root@b-27 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-clusters
CLUSTER	PARTI00        	CC_27          	10.111.1.27              	ENABLED	{}
CLUSTER	PARTI01        	CC_39          	10.111.1.39              	ENABLED	{}
{noformat}

*euca-describe-nodes*
{noformat}
[root@b-27 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-nodes
NODE	PARTI00		10.111.1.44	ENABLED
INSTANCE	i-019340F6
INSTANCE	i-49A03CE6
NODE	PARTI01		10.111.5.41	ENABLED
INSTANCE	i-75544201
INSTANCE	i-46B141D2
NODE	PARTI01		10.111.5.33	ENABLED
INSTANCE	i-48943F0C
NODE	PARTI00		10.111.1.43	ENABLED
INSTANCE	i-005E437E
INSTANCE	i-CA9B4139
INSTANCE	i-DCE03FFC
NODE	PARTI00		10.111.1.40	ENABLED
{noformat}

But when migration is requested for any of the NCs that is registered in {{PARTI00}}, it works fine.


{noformat}
[root@b-27 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_27          	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_27/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_39          	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.39:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_39/
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Jetty  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Dns    	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	reporting      	bootstrap      	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_27          	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Walrus 	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_27/
SERVICE	tokens         	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Tokens 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::tokens:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancing:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_27          	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_27/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_39          	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.39:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_39/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscaling:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatch:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	euare          	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Euare  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::euare:10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.1.27/
SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.27    	ENABLED   	132 	http://10.111.1.27:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.1.27/
{noformat}
fields.summary: Migrate command fails in multiple AZ environment
